data.name: Tape to Tape
data.detailed_description:
Tape to Tape is a roguelite hockey game where every choice matters on your journey to build the ultimate hockey team. Hire unique players, discover synergies between them, find new abilities, bribe the referees, visit the blademaster for new equipment and a lot more.

CRAFT YOUR TEAM

Start from your hub, choose your path on the world map and prepare to tinker with your team, players and abilities during your runs as the game offers you a different layout each time with easy and difficult paths.

LOSING IS ONLY THE BEGINNING

Losing a game may mean the end of your current season but it’s only the beginning for your fledgling team. Visit the blademaster between seasons and grow permanently stronger with better equipment for your upcoming journeys. New opportunities await each time you begin a new season. Players met during your season may even want to join your team permanently!

DEEP AND REWARDING GAMEPLAY

Combining the sensitive controls of modern hockey games with the fast-paced action of 90’s hockey video games, Tape to Tape is the ultimate simcade experience. One-timers, spin-O-ramas, saucer passes, bone-crushing body checks, spectacular saves, it’s all there!

4-PLAYER MULTIPLAYER!

The Tape to Tape demo is already playable online with a total of up to 4 players using Steam remote play or locally. The fast-paced gameplay and tight controls makes for memorable matchups. We also invite you to join our Discord server to play with the dev team or to find other player amongst our wonderful community. The Roguelike campaign will also be available to play cooperatively with a friend for a truly unique experience.

data.short_description: In Tape to Tape you explore a gorgeous roguelike hockey world trying to reach the major leagues! Recruit players, explore synergies, find upgrades, buy equipment, manage your team, choose your own path to victory! Embark on the epic journey alone or with friends!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Finnish, Japanese, Swedish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Quad Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M, 2 GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Quad Cor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
